nodes.text: The Little Mynock Airscooter, also abbreviated as LMA, was a model of toy airspeeder produced by the Mekuun Corporation's Leisure and Recreation division. It was a simple and reliable vehicle that was the choice of parents around the galaxy for their younglings first speeder. The airscooter's charge stand and helmets for the pilot were sold separately. Rivaling the popularity of civilian vehicles, it was easily modified for greater speed and range and was even used by the law enforcement agencies of some worlds inhabited by smaller species.

During the war between the First Order and the Resistance,  an airscooter was displayed on a rack at the Toydarian Toymaker in Black Spire Outpost on the planet Batuu. The model on display was older, but in fairly good condition, and customised with the "Classic Boles Roor" color scheme, matching the green and orange colors of podracer Boles Roor's vehicle.
The Little Mynock Airscooter was created as a prop for Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge, a theme park land that opened to guests on May 31, 2019 at Disneyland Park.
